sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.CW_DJXH AS cwDjxh, A.SS_JGBM AS ssJgbm, (select jc from qy_zzjg where jgbm=A.SS_JGBM) as jgMc, A.FYLB_CW_DJXH AS fylbCwDjxh, (select fylb_mc from cw_fylb where cw_djxh=A.FYLB_CW_DJXH) as lbMc, A.FYXM_MC AS fyxmMc, A.SPLC_XMFL_DJXH AS splcXmflDjxh, (select XMFLMC from QY_SPWS_XMFL where XMFL_DJXH=A.SPLC_XMFL_DJXH) as xmFl, A.YXBZ AS yxbz, A.CJR_CZY_DJXH AS cjrCzyDjxh, A.CJRQ AS cjrq, A.XGR_CZY_DJXH AS xgrCzyDjxh, A.XGRQ AS xgrq, (SELECT RY.MC from QY_RYDJ RY WHERE RY.CZY_DJXH=A.CJR_CZY_DJXH) cjrMc, (SELECT RY.MC from QY_RYDJ RY WHERE RY.CZY_DJXH=A.XGR_CZY_DJXH) xgrMc FROM CW_FYXM_WH A WHERE A.YXBZ='Y' and A.SS_JGBM=#zgs#
A.FYXM_MC like #xmmc#
$orderStr$

SELECT A.CW_DJXH AS cwDjxh, A.SS_JGBM AS ssJgbm, (select jc from qy_zzjg where jgbm=A.SS_JGBM) as jgMc, A.FYLB_CW_DJXH AS fylbCwDjxh, (select fylb_mc from cw_fylb where cw_djxh=A.FYLB_CW_DJXH) as lbMc, A.FYXM_MC AS fyxmMc, A.SPLC_XMFL_DJXH AS splcXmflDjxh, (select XMFLMC from QY_SPWS_XMFL where XMFL_DJXH=A.SPLC_XMFL_DJXH) as xmFl, A.YXBZ AS yxbz, A.CJR_CZY_DJXH AS cjrCzyDjxh, A.CJRQ AS cjrq, A.XGR_CZY_DJXH AS xgrCzyDjxh, A.XGRQ AS xgrq, (SELECT RY.MC from QY_RYDJ RY WHERE RY.CZY_DJXH=A.CJR_CZY_DJXH) cjrMc, (SELECT RY.MC from QY_RYDJ RY WHERE RY.CZY_DJXH=A.XGR_CZY_DJXH) xgrMc FROM CW_FYXM_WH A WHERE A.YXBZ='Y' and A.SS_JGBM=#zgs#
A.FYXM_MC like #xmmc#
ORDER by A.CW_DJXH ASC

SELECT count(A.CW_DJXH) FROM CW_FYXM_WH A WHERE A.YXBZ='Y' and A.SS_JGBM=#zgs#
A.FYXM_MC like #xmmc#
